attr.title: Full Moon Rush
attr.desc: Take on a howling challenge in Full Moon Rush! This classic shoot 'em up is a bullet hell masterpiece with a boss rush twist. With 15 epic battles and old-school graphics, you'll need expert shooting skills to survive. Customizable health and Assist Mode make it accessible to all.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all the game files into the assets folder.
